controller.initialization

Class StartUpPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.initialization.StartUpPhase

  • public class StartUpPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes care of the initialization part where it decides which countries are given to which player, how many armies should be given to each player and how many armies are placed in each country for that particular player. Assigning of countries and placeng the armies is random. Each player will get equalll number of armies.
    Author:
    Aravind Reddy

      • mappingElements

        public void mappingElements(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> continentHashMap,
                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> terrritoryHashMap,
                            int noOfPlayers)
        This function creates objects for all the map elements like country, continent, player
        Parameters:
        continentHashMap - This hashmap contains continents and their respective values
        terrritoryHashMap - This hashmap contains country as the key element and values comprise continent to which it belongs and the countries neighboring countries
        noOfPlayers - Number of palyers want to paly the game

      • initialSetUp

        public void initialSetUp(java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Continent> continentList,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryList)
        This function takes care of initial setup of the game based on the input given by the user. It provides certain number of armies to each player and certain countries in the selected map.
        Parameters:
        playerList - This contains all the player objects
        continentList - contains all continent objects
        countryList - contains country objects
